column2: Jones suffered a torn ACL in his right knee and is on injured reserve as a result.
Eldeman tore the ACL in his right knee and is on the injured reserve list.
Davis has been designated for injured reserve as he is recovering from a bulging disc in his neck.
Langi has been placed on the IR/Non-Football Injury list due to a back injury.
Jelks has landed on the Injured Reserve/Non-Football Injury list due to a knee injury.
Bennett has been placed on the injured reserve list with a torn rotator cuff and a hamstring injury.
Ebner has landed on injured reserve due to a knee injury.
McClellin has been placed on the IR/Designated for Return list with a concussion and is expected to miss the remainder of the season.
Hightower suffered a torn pectoral muscle and is on the injured reserve list.
King was confined to a limited role in practice due to a knee injury and his availability against the Eagles in Super Bowl 52 is clouded.
Brady is expected to be available for Super Bowl 52 against the Eagles despite a right hand laceration.
Butler is likely to line up against the Eagles in Super Bowl 52 despite ailing from flu-like symptoms.
McCourty is nursing a shoulder injury but is expected to participate in Super Bowl 52 against the Eagles.
Branch is sidelined with a knee injury but is expected to return against the Eagles in Super Bowl 52.
Wise is working his way through concussion protocol but is expected to be cleared in time for Super Bowl 52 against the Eagles.
Valentine has landed on the injured reserve list with a knee injury and it is unclear if he will be activated prior to Super Bowl 52 against the Eagles.
Mitchell is on the injured reserve list with a knee injury.
Jones has been placed on injured reserve due to a foot injury.
Brown is dealing with a knee injury but will likely take part in Super Bowl 52 against the Eagles.
Gillislee has a knee injury but is expected to suit up for Super Bowl 52 against the Eagles.
Waddle is bothered by a knee injury but is expected to play against the Eagles in Super Bowl 52.
Gronkowski suffered a concussion in the AFC championship game but has passed protocol and is expected to play in Super Bowl 52 against the Eagles.
Cannon has been placed on the injured reserve list with an ankle injury.
Garcia has landed on the Injured Reserve/Non-Football Illness list with an unspecified illness.
Rivers is on injured reserve after suffering a torn ACL in his left knee.
Sproles has been designated for the injured reserve list due to a torn ACL and a broken arm.
Pumphrey is on the injured reserve list with a torn hamstring.
Hicks tore his right Achilles and is on injured reserve.
Peters tore the ACL and MCL in his right knee and is on the injured reserve list.
Shittu has been placed on the injured reserve list due to a knee injury.
Williams has been designated for injured reserve with an Achilles injury.
Cox is expected to line up against the Patriots in Super Bowl 52 despite a calf injury.
Jernigan has been limited in practice due to an illness but is expected to be healthy for Super Bowl 52 against the Patriots.
Ellerbe is bothered by a hamstring injury but will likely play against the Patriots in Super Bowl 52.
Ajayi was confined to a limited role in practice due to an ankle injury but is expected to suit up against the Patriots in Super Bowl 52.
Jones is battling a hamstring injury and it is unknown if he will be available for Super Bowl 52 against the Patriots.
Foles is expected to be available against the Patriots in Super Bowl 52 despite soreness in his ribs.
Barner will likely take part in Super Bowl 52 against the Patriots despite ailing from an illness.
Walker has been placed on the injured reserve list with a neck injury.
Wentz suffered a torn ACL in his left knee and is on the injured reserve list.
Sturgis has landed on the injured reserve list with a strained quadriceps in his plant leg and is not expected to be activated at any point during the remainder of the season.
Darby is likely to be available against the Patriots in Super Bowl 52 despite an illness.
Maragos has landed on injured reserve with a knee injury.
Goforth has landed on injured reserve with a torn ACL.
